original_title: White Pass & Yukon Route: The Railway Built of Gold
overview: Completed in 1900 with British financing, Canadian contracting and American engineering, the White Pass & Yukon Route was the engineering marvel of its time. Cutting a swath through some of the world's most ruggedly beautiful terrain, the White Pass today is a trip through history.
tagline: An International Historic Civil Engineering Landmark
title: White Pass & Yukon Route: The Railway Built of Gold
